mapper.insert: /*主键冲突，会报错（通过配置ignore关键字，插入错误之后不报错，直接返回0，方便后续业务了逻辑的处理）*/ INSERT ignore INTO success_killed(seckill_id, user_phone, state) VALUES (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone}, 0)
mapper.select: /*如何告诉myabtis把结果映射到SuccessKilled同时映射到seckill属性*/ SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id as "seckill.seckill_id", s.name as "seckill.name", s.number as "seckill.number", s.start_time as "seckill.start_time", s.end_time as "seckill.end_time", s.create_time as "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone = #{userPhone}
